sentences.sContent: They were all ransomed and returned unharmed.
sentences.sCn: 付了赎金之后，他们都毫发无损地回来了。

synos.tran: 赎回，赎；勒索赎金；救赎；得赎金后释放

remMethod.val: ran(跑) + som(看作sum一笔钱) → 用一笔钱跑 → 赎金

trans.tranOther: to pay an amount of money so that someone who is being held as a prisoner is set free
an amount of money that is paid to free someone who is held as a prisoner
